sentences.en: All exhibits are for sale, the proceeds being split between Oxfam and the artist.
sentences.cn: 所有展品都将出售，收入由乐施会和艺术家平分。

sentences.en: All purchases shall be financed with the proceeds of loan.
As the air proceeds along the test section the boundary layer thickens.
sentences.cn: 当空气沿着试验段流动时附面层逐渐变厚.

sentences.en: Hairiness proceeds the formation of pills.
He proceeds to take apart every preconception anyone might have ever had about him.
sentences.cn: 他继续逐一剖析人们对他可能怀有的成见。

sentences.en: He sold his house and lives on the proceeds.
sentences.cn: 他卖了房子靠房款收入过日子.

sentences.en: She sold her car and bought a piano with the proceeds.
sentences.cn: 她卖掉了汽车，然后用这笔收入买了一架钢琴。

sentences.en: The new laws allow the confiscation of assets purchased with proceeds of the drugs trade.
sentences.cn: 新的法律允许没收用毒品交易所获收益购置的资产。

sentences.en: The proceeds from the concert will go towards famine relief.
sentences.cn: 音乐会的收入将用于救助饥荒。

sentences.en: The proceeds from the lottery go towards sports and recreation, as well as swelling the coffers of the government.
sentences.cn: 彩票收入用于发展体育和娱乐产业，同时还用来充实国库。

sentences.en: The proceeds from the sale will be used to repay the loan.
sentences.cn: 销售所得将用来偿还贷款.

sentences.en: The proceeds of the sale are split fifty-fifty.
They bought a new minibus with the proceeds from the auction.
sentences.cn: 他们用拍卖得来的钱买了一辆新面包车.

sentences.en: They gave the proceeds of the sale to the orphanage.
sentences.cn: 他们把销售的收入给了这家孤儿院.

sentences.en: They're going to fit things up out of the proceeds. "
sentences.cn: 他们要靠演出的收入布置装潢一下. ”

sentences.en: We sold the business and bought a villa in Spain with the proceeds.
sentences.cn: 我们卖了公司，用所得的钱在西班牙买了一幢别墅。

phrases.tran_cn: 销售收入，销售收益；售楼收益

trans.tran_en: the money that is obtained from doing something or selling something

trans.tran_cn: 进行( proceed的第三人称单数 )，前进，（沿特定路线）行进，（尤指打断后）继续说
